requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista
  • Processor: Pentium III 800MHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 16bit SVGA (800x600)
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster 16
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2, i3, i5, or i7+ processor, or AMD Phenom processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware-accelerated graphic adapter at 1024Ã—768 or higher resolution
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster Audigy or better

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit operating system and processor
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit operating system and processor
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
